attributes.action: Courts “Must” impose a minimum sentence to ALL who attack the Police Officers.
attributes.additional_details:
It costs the Forces money through sickness and reduced Officers on the beat.

Let’s protect the ones who protect us.
attributes.background:
There are too many attacks these days on Police Officers trying to keep us safe, the Courts Must Get behind them, they have a job to do like most people and should be able to do it Without being attacked.

Many are off work due to injuries, let’s put these Thugs who do Not respect them in Prison.
